health_tech: FHIR API for healthcare data exchange

evidence.claim: The company utilizes AWS services including Lambda and S3 for scalable serverless applications.
AI Insurance Inc. is HIPAA compliant, ensuring security and privacy for health data.
The integration of FHIR APIs allows seamless interoperability with EHR systems.
X12 EDI transactions are supported for efficient claims processing.

icp.icp_reason: Company supports X12 EDI transactions for health insurance data exchange.
